response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you, which I believe will significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional value and capabilities, we are confident it would be a worthwhile investment for you. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering this product to you at an exclusive price of $12,000. This offer is tailored to provide you with a substantial savings while ensuring you receive a product that meets or exceeds your expectations. We look forward to the opportunity to serve you and hope to hear your positive response soon.", "product_price": 12000}
